description: Clean Earth is a full-service environmental solutions company specializing in the recycling, treatment, disposal, and beneficial reuse of hazardous and non-hazardous waste, contaminated soil, and dredged material. They operate the largest network of Treatment, Storage, and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) in the United States, providing customized, compliant waste management programs for various industries.
products_services: Hazardous & Non-Hazardous Waste Disposal and Recycling
Contaminated Soil Remediation (Bioremediation, Chemical Fixation, Thermal Desorption, Physical Treatment)
Universal Waste Recycling (Lamps, Batteries, Ballasts, Mercury Devices)
Emergency Response (24/7 Hazardous Waste & Natural Disaster)
Environmental Support & Professional Services (Waste Audits, Reporting, Compliance)
Pipeline & Horizontal Directional Drill Cuttings Recycling
AssetSure (IT Asset Ship Direct Recycling & Data Destruction)
RecycleKits (Prepaid recycling kits for small quantity generators)
physical_address: 405 Powell Street, Avalon, TX 76623, United States
certifications: NAID AAA Certification for Facility-Based Hard Drive and Solid State Device Destruction
Top 200 Environmental Firm by Engineering News-Record (12 consecutive years)
Environment + Energy Leader Top Project of the Year Award
Newsweek's List of the Most Loved Workplaces (2021, Harsco Corporation)
summary:
Clean Earth Inc. is a leading national provider of specialty waste treatment, disposal, and recycling solutions. With over 30 years of experience, the company operates the largest network of RCRA-permitted Treatment, Storage, and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) in the country, offering a one-source, full-service solution for managing hazardous and non-hazardous waste, contaminated soil, dredged material, and electronic waste. Their services are tailored to a wide range of industries including manufacturing, retail, pharmaceuticals, construction, chemical, government, education, and energy.

The company is distinguished by its strong commitment to recycling and beneficial reuse, processing over 4 million tons of material companywide in 2021 with a 93% recycling rate. Their advanced service portfolio includes innovative programs like FullCircle™ for waste lifecycle management, emergency response, and specialized treatment for emerging contaminants like PFAS. Clean Earth emphasizes environmental compliance, safety, and customer partnership, helping clients meet regulatory requirements and sustainability goals through customized, efficient waste management programs.
